sqlMap.statement: SELECT EaiBzwkDstcd AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD" , BzwkDsticName AS "BZWKDSTICNAME", BzwkDsticDesc AS "BZWKDSTICDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 WHERE EaiBzwkDstcd = #eaiBzwkDstcd#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 SET BzwkDsticName = #eaiBzwkDsticName#, BzwkDsticDesc = #bzwkDsticDesc# WHERE BzwkDstcd = #bzwkDstcd#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAICM01( EaiBzwkDstcd, BzwkDsticName, BzwkDsticDesc) VALUES (#eaiBzwkDstcd# , #bzwkDsticName#, #bzwkDsticDesc# )

SELECT C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "BIZCODE" , C01.BZWKDSTICNAME AS "BIZNAME" , C01.BZWKDSTICDESC AS "BIZDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C01 , $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 R06 WHERE C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD = R06.EAIBZWKDSTCD AND R06.USERID = #userId# ORDER BY C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD
SELECT C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "BIZCODE" , C01.BZWKDSTICNAME AS "BIZNAME" , C01.BZWKDSTICDESC AS "BIZDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C01 order by C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD
